scripts.clean:images: docker images -a | grep none | awk '{ print $3; }' | xargs docker rmi --force
scripts.clean: npm run clean:node_modules && npm run clean:images
scripts.dev: npm run dev:install && npm run dev:upgrade && npm run dev:prettify
scripts.dev:install: npm run dev:install:orchestrator && npm run dev:install:studio
scripts.dev:upgrade: npm run dev:upgrade:orchestrator && npm run dev:upgrade:studio
scripts.dev:prettify: npm run dev:prettify:orchestrator && npm run dev:prettify:studio
scripts.first-time: npm i -g npm-check-updates && npm run dev
